purpose: To provide a simple and powerful command-line tool for coding assistance using AI.
principle: Built on TypeScript, leveraging AI models for code generation and enhancement.
reusability: Can be integrated into existing development workflows via command-line interface.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited functionality and stability issues.
name: mycoder
description: Simple to install, powerful command-line based AI agent system for coding.
highlight: Command-line based AI agent system designed to enhance coding efficiency.
